You create a new group named Group1. You provide Group1 with permission to sign in to Pool1.

Which two privileges should you assign to Group1? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.F: the Storage File Data SMB Share Contributor role for storage1
choices.C: the Modify NTFS permissions for share1
choices.D: the Storage File Data SMB Share Reader role for storage1
choices.B: the List folder / read data NTFS permissions for share1
choices.E: the Storage File Data SMB Share Elevated Contributor role for storage1
choices.A: the Storage Blob Data Contributor role for storage1

choices.C: Add the users to the local Administrators group on the virtual machines.
choices.B: Add the users to a Remote Desktop Users group on the virtual machines.
